name: European Intermediation
membership: Member of Cercle des Délégués Permanents Français (Brussels)
goal:
EU issues management and reputation management services.

Political mapping, policy monitoring, institutional outreach contact programmes and European media relation services to businesses and trade associations.

Training and coaching on EU activity.
interests: Banking and financial services, Communication, Competition, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Financial services policy (banking, insurance, fiancial markets), digital economy policy (telecoms, data privacy, internet), media policy (governance, competition).
customers: Institut Supérieur Européen du Lobbying (ISEL),Tipik,Institut Supérieur du Management Public et Politique (ISMAPP),Nathalie Devallée architectes paysagistes,Cambre Associates,Ecole Nationale d’Administration (ENA),Ecole des Hautes Études Commerciales (EDHEC)
